name: cdeqcv

body.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ CondEq(s0 = s1 → s0 = s1)
⊣ (s0 = s1 → s0 = s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcdeq(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ CondEq(s0 = s1 → s0 = s1)
⊣ (s0 = s1 → s0 = s1)

comment: Conditional equality for set-to-class promotion. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
